snippet.title: VR Game "Cave Digger"  Trailer : Are you ready for adventure and wealth?
snippet.description:
Cave Digger is a virtual reality mining game for HTC Vive and Oculus Rift. The game takes place in a small town in an alternative western universe. Gear up with scrappy aftermarket tools and devices and jump into the elevator that will take you deep down into the mine. Find the rich veins that are just waiting for the honest, hard workers to whack their pickaxes at them!

Return back to the surface to enrich yourself! Upgrade your tools to advance deeper. New tools open new possibilities for the brave worker: harder materials and more valuable treasures are waiting for you just behind the next block of granite. How much money is enough? Will you be able to stop? What happens if you don’t? The Answer to these questions and more lay at the bottom of the mine. 

Features:

Whack the rock with various scrappy tools
Loot the shiny bits falling on the floor and collect them to benefit your mysterious overseer
Upgrade your tools as you become privileged enough to afford high-tech luxury items.

Follow us!

 Facebook: https://goo.gl/pNkLeC
 Twitter: https://goo.gl/W5kEcJ
